cheerful.translation[0].definitions[0].d: happy, or behaving in a way that shows you are happy
cheerful.translation[0].definitions[0].e: I’m making a real effort to be cheerful despite everything.
‘I’m Robyn, ’ she said with a cheerful smile.
It does me good to see a cheerful face.
cheerful.translation[0].definitions[1].d: something that is cheerful makes you feel happy because it is so bright or pleasant
cheerful.translation[0].definitions[1].e: There was a cheerful picture on the wall.
The house has a cheerful atmosphere.
cheerful.translation[0].definitions[2].d: tending to be happy most of the time
cheerful.translation[0].definitions[2].e: She was a cheerful and agreeable companion.
Before the accident he had been cheerful and confident.
cheerful.translation[0].definitions[3].d: a cheerful attitude shows that you are willing to do whatever is necessary in a happy way
cheerful.translation[0].definitions[3].e: a cheerful approach to the job
